column1: And wooden nickels could be cheap. Obvious title is obvious. CNBC has sunk to Buzzfail listicles. It wasn't far to go, but they found a way. “The coronavirus pandemic could change the way we work — forever” by @CNBCMakeIt
I'm sure the seasonal flu having a low mortality rate was a HUGE comfort to him. #COVID19 "British man aboard Diamond Princess ship dies from coronavirus"

Desperation makes monsters of everyone.
